name: SkateBot Replication
description:
SkateBot Replication is a game made for the Games Made Qucik??? III-2 jam.  Explore the world, and collect parts to create more of yourself.

Use the left and right arrows to move, up to jump, space to dash, and shift to glide. Collect all 50 robot parts and bring them to the factory terminal to build more robots.
